name: wts-mint-nft
description: CLI tool for watching directories and minting NFTs on Solana

scripts.check-balance: node -e "import('./src/nft-minter.js').then(async ({NFTMinter}) => { const m = new NFTMinter({rpcUrl: process.env.HELIUS_API_KEY ? 'https://mainnet.helius-rpc.com/?api-key=' + process.env.HELIUS_API_KEY : 'https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com', keypairPath: './wallet.json'}); await m.initializeForAPI(); const info = await m.getWalletInfo(); console.log('Balance:', info.balance, 'SOL'); })"
scripts.check-arweave: node -e "const url = process.argv[1]; if(!url) { console.log('Usage: npm run check-arweave <arweave-url>'); process.exit(1); } fetch(url).then(r => console.log('Status:', r.status, r.statusText, '| Type:', r.headers.get('content-type'))).catch(e => console.log('Error:', e.message))" --
